name: Hermes
description:
God's messenger and guide 
of dead souls into the Underground

name: Apollo
description:
God of the Sun, music, poetry 
and even archery

name: Artemis
description:
Goddess of hunt, animals, 
nature, virility and the Moon

name: Dionysus
description:
God of wine, fun, party, 
festivity and theater

name: Aphrodite
description:
Goddess of love, pleasure, 
beauty, passion and procreation

name: Demeter
description:
Goddess of the harvest, agriculture 
and the fertility of the Earth

name: Ares
description:
God of war, personification 
of sheer brudality

name: Athena
description:
Goddess of heroes, intelligence, 
wisdom, handicrafy

name: Poseidon
description:
God of the sea, storms, 
earthquake and horses

name: Hera
description:
Goddess of women, marrige, 
family and childbirth

name: Hades
description:
God of the dead, 
the king of the Underworld

name: Zeus
description:
Ruler of the gods and people, 
donor of life and human destiny
